item.title: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open!
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
With the end of Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019’s preseale of the Magical Mirai 2018 ver. Nendoroid, that means online preorders are now open! Miku from Magical Mirai 2018 has arrived! From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing her outfit from the Magical Mirai 2018 main visual illustration! …

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the end of Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019’s preseale of the Magical Mirai 2018 ver. Nendoroid, that means online preorders are now open!

Miku from Magical Mirai 2018 has arrived!
From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing her outfit from the Magical Mirai 2018 main visual illustration! Illustrator Mika Pikazo’s colorful and upbeat version of Miku has been brought to life.

She comes with three face plates including an energetic standard expression, a smiling expression and a winking expression often seen during concerts! Her school uniform themed outfit has been perfectly recreated in Nendoroid size. Her megaphone mic decorated with a cube and balloons is included. Both a stand type and handheld megaphone are included allowing for various different poses. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Preorders for this nendoroid will be available from Good Smile Company’s online shop until October 3rd at 12:00 PM JST, and has a price of 5,093 JPY ($48.99 USD). The expected shipping period is around February 2020.

Check out more photos by Kahotan on her review of the figure! → https://mikatan.goodsmile.info/en/2019/08/30/nendoroid-hatsune-miku-magical-mirai-2018-ver/

> Nendoroid Product page
> Nendoroid Preorder page

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Tokyo Concert Setlist (Spoilers!), Magical Mirai 2020 Announced
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
With the passing of the final performance in Tokyo, Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 has finally came to a close, and the Tokyo concert setlist is also now online, thanks to the tweets by @jt4mtb. While bearing many similarities to Osaka’s, we’d like you to personally check out the Tokyo concert setlist below. For those who may be interested, preorders for …

The post Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Tokyo Concert Setlist (Spoilers!), Magical Mirai 2020 Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the passing of the final performance in Tokyo, Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 has finally came to a close, and the Tokyo concert setlist is also now online, thanks to the tweets by @jt4mtb. While bearing many similarities to Osaka’s, we’d like you to personally check out the Tokyo concert setlist below.

For those who may be interested, preorders for Blu-ray & DVD are still open on AmiAmi and CDJapan, featuring complete recording of the final show in Tokyo including the encore. Check out our Osaka concert setlist article for more details → https://www.mikufan.com/?p=27962

Magical Mirai 2019 https://magicalmirai.com/2019/

01. Teo by Omoi feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
02. All I Need are Things I Like by PinocchioP feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
03. Love Song by LamazeP feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
MC
04. Kaisei by Orangestar feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
05. Deep Sea City Underground by tanakaB feat. Kagamine Rin
06. Main Character by *Luna feat. Kagamine Len V4X
07-DAY1 BRING IT ON by GigaP feat. Kagamine Rin & Len (Kagamine Rin & Len 10th anniversary)
07-DAY2 Roki by MikitoP feat. Kagmine Rin
07-DAY3 Romeo and Cinderella by doriko feat. Hatsune Miku
08-DAY1 Karakuri Pierrot by 40mP feat. Hatsune Miku
08-DAY2 Sand Planet by Hachi feat. Hatsune Miku (Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary)
08-DAY3 Karakuri Pierrot by 40mP feat. Hatsune Miku
09-DAY1 Catch the Wave by kz feat. Hatsune Miku (Project DIVA MEGA39’s/Mega Mix)
09.DAY2 Animal Fortune-Telling by scop feat. Hatsune Miku
09-DAY3 Catch the Wave by kz feat. Hatsune Miku (Project DIVA MEGA39’s/Mega Mix)
10-DAY1 Baby Maniacs By HachioujiP feat. Hatsune Miku
10-DAY2 Baby Maniacs By HachioujiP feat. Hatsune Miku
10-DAY3 BRING IT ON by GigaP feat. Kagamine Rin & Len (Kagamine Rin & Len 10th anniversary)
11. Kill Carry On by Police Paccadilly feat. Hatsune Miku
12. A Plan is Still in Progress Covertly by Shinra feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2019 Song Contest)
13. Ramnade Blue Longing by Aoto Kei feat. MEIKO
14. Never Die by Yuyoyuppe feat. Megurine Luka
15-DAY1 Stardust Utopia by otetsu feat. Megurine Luka (V4X remake)
15-DAY2 Stardust Utopia by otetsu feat. Megurine Luka (V4X remake)
15-DAY3 Dreamin Chuchu by emon feat. Megurine Luka (together with Hatsune Miku & Kagamine Rin)
16-DAY1 Luka Luka★Night Fever by samfree feat. Megurine Luka
16-DAY2 Just be Friends by Dixie Flatline feat. Megurine Luka
16-DAY3 Luka Luka★Night Fever by samfree feat. Megurine Luka
17. Even If It’s Your Happiness by HeavenzP feat. Megurine Luka
18. Jump for Joy by EasyPop feat. Hatsune Miku & Megurine Luka (Megurine Luka 10th anniversary)
BAND MEMBER INTRODUCTION
19. Ohedo Julia-Night by Mitchie M feat. Hatsune Miku & KAITO
20. With Your Steady Eyes by Mitchie M feat. Hatsune Miku
21. HIBANA by DECO＊27 feat. Hatsune Miku
22. Greenlights Serenade by Omoi feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2018 theme song)
MC 
23. Until I Throw My Dreams Away and Become an Adult by Kasamura Touta feat. Hatsune Miku

ENCORE
24-DAY1 Unknown Mother Goose by wowaka feat. Hatsune Miku
24-DAY2 World’s End Dancehall by wowaka feat. Hatsune Miku
24-DAY3 Rolling Girl by wowaka feat. Hatsune Miku
25. Hand in Hand by kz feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2015 theme song)
26. Bless Your Breath by Wada Takeaki feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2019 theme song)

ライブ最終公演が終了！これで、初音ミク「マジカルミライ 2019」全日程が終了しました！6日間の動員数はライブ・企画展合わせ、約5万人となりました！ご来場の皆様ありがとうございました！！https://t.co/UU22L8ZrcQ #マジカルミライ2019 #初音ミク #鏡音リン #鏡音レン #巡音ルカ #MEIKO #KAITO pic.twitter.com/qSj8fHbxOs

— 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) September 1, 2019

Following the closing performance in Tokyo also comes the announcement for Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2020! The event will be held at INTEX Osaka in Osaka on August 7th~9th, 2020, and Makuhari Messe in Tokyo on December 18th~20th, 2020.

The announcement came as the performance came to a close, and it sure had the crowd shook in excitement! Be sure to follow the official Magical Mirai Twitter if you haven’t already, and stay tuned for more info!

Magical Mirai 2020 https://magicalmirai.com/2020/
Magical Mirai Twitter https://twitter.com/magicalmirai

初音ミク「マジカルミライ 2020」は、2020年8月7日（金）～9日（日）にインテックス大阪、12月18日（金）～20日（日）に幕張メッセで開催します！ https://t.co/E9fUjxmNW0

#マジカルミライ2020 #マジカルミライ2019 #初音ミク #鏡音リン #鏡音レン #巡音ルカ #MEIKO #KAITO pic.twitter.com/e99Qv6u9d7

— 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) September 1, 2019

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Tokyo Concert Setlist (Spoilers!), Magical Mirai 2020 Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Goodsmile Racing Finishes 10th at the 10 Hours of Suzuka
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The 48th edition of the of the Summer Endurance Race concluded last weekend with Audi Sport Team WRT taking victory at the 10 Hours of Suzuka. Just a lap behind them was Mercedes-AMG Team GOODSMILE finishing in 10th place. 📝 #Suzuka10H RACE REPORT Audi Sport Team WRT claimed victory in the penultimate round of 2019’s …

The post Goodsmile Racing Finishes 10th at the 10 Hours of Suzuka appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The 48th edition of the of the Summer Endurance Race concluded last weekend with Audi Sport Team WRT taking victory at the 10 Hours of Suzuka. Just a lap behind them was Mercedes-AMG Team GOODSMILE finishing in 10th place.

#Suzuka10H RACE REPORT

Audi Sport Team WRT claimed victory in the penultimate round of 2019’s #IntGTC campaign at #Suzuka10H this evening thanks to a dominant performance by Van der Linde, Vanthoor and Vervisch.https://t.co/V4RDSVemzS pic.twitter.com/YbWUB26WVe

— Intercontinental GT Challenge (@IntercontGTC) August 25, 2019

The #00 Hatsune Miku Mercedes-AMG GT3 would qualify in 6th for the start of the race which started off well overtaking the #777 CarGuy Ferrari 488 GT3 on the first lap. The first hour of the race would be calm with some overtakes and minor spins until the first big incident would happen when the #88 JLOC Lamborghini Huracan GT3 made contact with the #5 GTNET Nissan GT-R GT3 to overtake spinning both cars and getting the #34 Walkenhorst BMW M6 GT3 that was in 2nd place involved forcing them to pit for repairs.

DRAMA AT THE FRONT! @C_Krognes's @Walkenhorst_MS BMW is tagged by GTNet's spinning Nissan and has damaged its rear wing!@augustofarfus just made it past and continues to lead, but @followWRT's Vervisch is now up to second with @goodsmileracing third.#IntGTC | @suzuka_event pic.twitter.com/kKL9J6wyov

— Intercontinental GT Challenge (@IntercontGTC) August 25, 2019

Things start to heat up after 2 hours into the race when the #27 HubAuto Ferrari 488 GT3 and the #98 Arrows Honda NSX GT3 started banging wheels until the Honda went off track followed by a ‘T-bone’ collision with the Ferrari bringing out the first long Full Course Yellow meaning all cars should slow down and no overtaking is allowed.

BIG IMPACT! @NickCassidy_'s HubAuto @FerrariRaces has been T-boned at the Hairpin by Arrows Racing's @hondaproracing. The two made contact at the kick, sending the NSX across the gravel.

Full Course Yellow #IntGTC | #Suzuka10H pic.twitter.com/llk12aig56

— Intercontinental GT Challenge (@IntercontGTC) August 25, 2019

After the race restarted the #999 GruppeM Mercedes-AMG GT3 makes a move on the #00 Miku AMG late braking into the final chicane causing both cars to go off track. This also helped the #018 KCMG Nissan GT-R GT3 (Not to be confused with the #18 UpGarage NSX GT3) overtake the Miku AMG down the main straight as she was recovering from the earlier contact. The incident gave the #999 GruppeM a 5 second penalty for cutting the chicane.

Change for P4: Marciello lunges down the inside of @goodsmileracing's AMG at the chicane and makes it stick. That causes @kamui_kobayashi to lose time and allows @KCMotorgroup's @aleximperatori to also nip through!#IntGTC | #Suzuka10H pic.twitter.com/bkquhcPcQn

— Intercontinental GT Challenge (@IntercontGTC) August 25, 2019

As the race enters the second half, the #27 HubAuto Ferrari loses control at the fast-left turn of 130R crashing into the foam barriers, bringing out the Full Course Yellow once again. Fortunately, Nick Cassidy who was driving the Ferrari escaped un-injured and surprisingly the car wasn’t badly damaged that he managed to drive it back into the pits for repairs.

More hits than elvis today. Hit by an AM I was lapping and paid for it later. Can’t wait to get back to Super Formula and Super GT. pic.twitter.com/i8cz3C6lsk

— Nick Cassidy (@NickCassidy_) August 25, 2019

As night falls at the track, the lights go on giving teams an extra challenge racing in the darkness. As the race was reaching it’s closing stages, Super GT’s GT500 driver Tsugio Matsuda in the #35 KCMG GT-R makes a move on the #107 Bentley Team M-Sport late braking into the final chicane and still fighting for 6th place side-by-side along the main straight until the GT-R successfully overtook the Bentley.

It's Godzilla vs Thunder at @suzuka_event!

Well played @TsugioMatsuda and @jordanpepper46! Fantastic battle.#IntGTC | #Suzuka10H pic.twitter.com/G6rDesFWQU

— Intercontinental GT Challenge (@IntercontGTC) August 25, 2019

At last after a long 10 hours of non-stop racing the checkered flag was waved with the #25 Audi Sport Team WRT taking victory with the #00 Miku AMG just behind them a lap behind to finish in 10th position. Although Mercedes-AMG Team GOODSMILE may not have won the race overall. The team has been awarded the “Team of the Day” as voted by race fans during the race. They were also awarded the winner of the Super GT award and runner up of the Asia Award for being the first Super GT team to finish and a team with at least 2 or more Asian drivers respectively.

00号車GOODSMILE RACINGはアジア賞2位 SUPER GT賞1位
おめでとう&お疲れ様でした#SUZUKA10H #fightgsr pic.twitter.com/oD3sDq87MR

— oChii XS Max (@hiroya_0124) August 25, 2019

Congratulations to all the winners and the teams that finished on the podium. Until then, Super GT is next on the 7th and 8th of September at Autopolis.

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Goodsmile Racing Finishes 10th at the 10 Hours of Suzuka appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Sings in Netflix Japan Summer Anime Lineup Promotional Video
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Hatsune Miku has managed to score yet another gig in a major promotional video, this time for Netflix in Japan! Hatsune Miku was the singer of choice in Netflix Japan’s latest Summer Anime Lineup promotional video. Check it out below! The song is new and original for this promotional video, and as such doesn’t have …

The post Hatsune Miku Sings in Netflix Japan Summer Anime Lineup Promotional Video appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku has managed to score yet another gig in a major promotional video, this time for Netflix in Japan! Hatsune Miku was the singer of choice in Netflix Japan’s latest Summer Anime Lineup promotional video. Check it out below!

The song is new and original for this promotional video, and as such doesn’t have a name, or even a credit to the artist that composed it. But the instrumental selection and vocal tuning style sounds incredibly familiar to some well-known Vocaloid producer that we can’t put a finger on. Kudos to those who can identify who it is, and please share in the comments below!

Also available on Twitter at @NetflixJP_Anime

Source: Mikufan.com

  • Im Wörterbuch speichern
    • Keine Wortliste für Englisch -> Deutsch…
    • Eine neue Wortliste erstellen…
  • Kopieren

The post Hatsune Miku Sings in Netflix Japan Summer Anime Lineup Promotional Video appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure feat. Annindoufu Preorders Now Open
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The Racing Miku 2019 ver. 1/8 scale figure feat. Annindoufu is now open for preorder! She’s now available from Good Smile Company’s online shop, and various online stores! A scale figure of the official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project! The official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project, Racing Miku 2019 Ver. …

The post Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure feat. Annindoufu Preorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Racing Miku 2019 ver. 1/8 scale figure feat. Annindoufu is now open for preorder! She’s now available from Good Smile Company’s online shop, and various online stores!

A scale figure of the official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project!

The official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project, Racing Miku 2019 Ver. feat. Annindoufu, is now a 1/8th scale figure! The original 2019 Racing Miku illustration by Annindoufu has been carefully brought to life in eye-popping detail.

The various frills and details of her idol-themed outfit have been faithfully recreated. Translucent parts have been used to recreate her hair, giving her hair a somewhat see-through appearance at the tips. Be sure to add her to your collection!

*This product is a GSR coupon item.
https://www.goodsmileracing.com/sponsors/coupon/?language=en

Preorders are now open on Good Smile Online’s shop at 15,800 yen ($151 USD) until September 5th at 12:00 PM JST, with an expected ship date in January 2021. She’s also available from these other online shops listed below!

Check back in a few hours for pending inks!
> Tokyo Otaku Mode (Supports MikuFan!)
> CDJapan (Supports MikuFan!)
> Good Smile Company
> Amiami
> Hobby Search
> Nippon Yasan
> Hobby Link Japan

Product Page
https://www.goodsmile.info/en/product/8643/

Check out the review by Kahotan from Good Smile Company!
https://mikatan.goodsmile.info/en/2019/08/02/racing-miku-2019-ver-feat-annindoufu/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure feat. Annindoufu Preorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.

The post SEGA to Release Hatsune Miku: Ghost Rule Ver. Plushie in Late September 2019 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
SEGA has revealed a new Hatsune Miku plushie hitting the arcades and shops this September, the Hatsune Miku GHOST Special Fuwafuwa ver. plushie!

The plushie design comes from Hatsune Miku’s outfit/module (design by Hassan) for the song “Ghost Rule” from Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone, and is 27cm tall. According to SEGA, the plushie is expected to be available starting around the 4th week of September 2019.

Good luck catching her in arcades, or online!

Plushie Details Page: http://segaplaza.jp//channel/sub_channel.php?t=566&sub_channel_id=4932

Source: Mikufan.com

The post SEGA to Release Hatsune Miku: Ghost Rule Ver. Plushie in Late September 2019 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: KarenT Releases Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary Album Collection
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
In celebration of the upcoming Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary, Crypton Future Media’s music label KarenT has announced a special album collection from 14 producers, now available on iTunes Store, Amazon MP3 and more! Check out more details on the special page with the main visual by the illustrator 4 (Yon)! What do you have in …

The post KarenT Releases Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary Album Collection appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In celebration of the upcoming Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary, Crypton Future Media’s music label KarenT has announced a special album collection from 14 producers, now available on iTunes Store, Amazon MP3 and more! Check out more details on the special page with the main visual by the illustrator 4 (Yon)!

What do you have in mind for Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary?

  • Phobos / wotaku
  • Whispermint / Shiiya Yu
  • sign of love / Udon Timer P
  • I hate / amakawa setsu
  • Lazy Cruise / cat nap
  • A bouquet / Minato Itsuki
  • narrow private room e.p. / msr
  • Eve / forute
  • A piece of treasure / Ako
  • Color Of Tears / harunacute
  • Maple Syrup / AETA
  • aquamarine / narry
  • BEST OF DIVA / Nejishiki
  • Lovers Ride A Dream Of Destiny / Saiki Masao

Today once again, this voice carries the joy of singing and the happiness of music.
Here is the Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary feature!

– Message from KarenT

Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary album collection
https://karent.jp/special/miku19

Source: Mikufan.com

The post KarenT Releases Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary Album Collection appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
The latest blog update from Good Smile Company’s figure reviewer and blogger “Kahotan” is a spotlight on our favorite idol-themed Racing Miku 2019 ver. 1/8 scale figure! Based on the visual by Annin Oiko, she has been carefully brought to life with expert craftsmanship and thorough attention to details, from her partially translucent twintails to her skin-tight boots.

Preorders will open on GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP from August 6th. Be sure to keep an eye out for her on Good Smile Company official site, or on other various online stores available!

Check out the full review and gallery on Kahotan’s blog!

item.title: Sports Hochi to Release Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Special Issue, Cover by Kanzaki Hiro
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The sports tabloid newspaper Sports Hochi will be releasing a special issue covering the upcoming Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 events this month with cover illustration by Kanzaki Hiro! The issue will cover from special interviews with the creators of Magical Mirai down to its history and main visuals. You’ll find the Hatsune Miku: Magical …

The post Sports Hochi to Release Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Special Issue, Cover by Kanzaki Hiro appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The sports tabloid newspaper Sports Hochi will be releasing a special issue covering the upcoming Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 events this month with cover illustration by Kanzaki Hiro! The issue will cover from special interviews with the creators of Magical Mirai down to its history and main visuals.

You’ll find the Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 special issue for sale at both the Osaka and Tokyo venues, or at the C96 in Tokyo Big Sight on August 9th~12th, with the creator interviews and other contents as listed below:

  • Ryoji Sekimoto (Magical Mirai 2018 & 2019 producer)
  • Wada Takeaki (Magical Mirai 2019 theme song “Bless Your Breath“)
  • Shinra (Magical Mirai 2019 OFFICIAL ALBUM’s “A plan is still in progress covertly“)
  • EasyPop (Magical Mirai 2019’s 2nd theme song “Jump for Joy“)
  • Cheriko & Yuma Saito (“Bless Your Breath“‘s illustrator and animation producer)
  • How to draw with Nardack (Snow Miku 2015)
  • How to draw with Kanzaki Hiro (Oreimo, Racing Miku 2018)
  • History of Magical Mirai & Main Visuals

Additionally, the special issue will also come included with a poster, so don’t miss out!

Magical Mirai 2019 https://magicalmirai.com/2019/
Special Issue by Sports Hochi https://magicalmirai.com/2019/goods_houchi_newspaper.html

まず、C96とマジカルミライ2019で共通販売する「マジカルミライ特別号」表紙イラストをついに大公開！今回の担当はかんざきひろさんです！ #初音ミク #C96 #コミックマーケット96 #マジカルミライ2019 #マジカルミライ pic.twitter.com/AJLgd8k3eQ

— 報知@C96No.1216＆マジミラ大阪No.12 (@hochi_comiket) August 1, 2019

C96とマジカルミライ2019で共通販売するスポーツ報知「マジカルミライ特別号」にて描き下ろしイラスト1枚描かせて頂きました！インタビューと簡単なメイキングも掲載して頂いて、アクリルスタンドも発売する予定です。よろしくお願い致します
https://t.co/aVhVqy6hPh
https://t.co/QMdZxfUiXY pic.twitter.com/FeZsdUjZ4a

— Nardack (@Nardack) August 2, 2019

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Sports Hochi to Release Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Special Issue, Cover by Kanzaki Hiro appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku x Magatsu Wahrheit Collaboration Music Contest Announced
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Hatsune Miku will be collaborating with the full-scale multiplayer online mobile RPG “Magatsu Wahrheit” by KLabGames that launched earlier in late April this year with over 460,000 pre-registrations. The collaboration music contest is now live on piapro under the theme “live in the present era“. Three winning entries will be chosen as in-game BGM, as …

The post Hatsune Miku x Magatsu Wahrheit Collaboration Music Contest Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku will be collaborating with the full-scale multiplayer online mobile RPG “Magatsu Wahrheit” by KLabGames that launched earlier in late April this year with over 460,000 pre-registrations. The collaboration music contest is now live on piapro under the theme “live in the present era“.

Three winning entries will be chosen as in-game BGM, as well as winning various Hatsune Miku goods, Magatsu Wahrheit goods, and in-game items. Additionally, winning entries will also be promoted across Magatsu Wahrheit’s social media. Entries are open starting now, and will close on September 20th, 2019 at 17:00 JST!

Magatsu Wahrheit tells a story of a world that is Wahrheit hanging on a brink of extinction, where a group of mankind known as the Kidou Heidan has taken up arms against threats to humanity. The game is available on both iOS and Android.

Target characters

Hatsune Miku / Kagamine Rin & Len / Megurine Luka

Entry Eligibility

Any applicants registered to piapro.jp, and agree to the application method and rules of entry.

Song Length

1 minute 30 seconds or more, but no more than 5 minutes

File Format

MP3

Result release date

September 2019

Other Notes

  • Entry must be an unreleased original song.
  • Please make sure to include the lyrics of the song when submitting.
  • Please limit to one character per submission, with the exception of Kagamine Rin & Len that must be submitted together.
  • Please be ready to provide WAV data and lyrics once submission is adopted.
  • IMPORTANT NOTE: Entries must be uploaded with the tag “禍つヴァールハイト２０１９＿楽曲” (copy and paste without quotes). Please make sure to lock the tag otherwise your entry will be invalid.
  • IMPORTANT NOTE: Make sure your entry is submitted without any licenses! During the submission process linked below, you’ll be presented with a list of licenses. Choose the checkbox at the bottom for “Upload without licenses”.

-> Click Here To Begin Submission Application <-

Magatsu Wahrheit: https://www.magatsu-wahrheit.com/
Song Contest: https://piapro.jp/pages/official_collabo/magatsu/
Submission list: https://piapro.jp/pages/official_collabo/magatsu/list
